DOC.brief_summary: The aim is to evaluate the impact of RPh201 on brain activity in chronic vegetative state patients. The assessment will be done using clinical measurements and functional MRI studies.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of RPh201 on Chronic Vegetative State (CVS): fMRI Study
DOC.criteria: chronic vegetative state patients allergic reaction to treatment patients that can not undergo MRI Pregnancy
